Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Populate \Pop"u*late\, v. t. [imp. & p. p. {Populated}; p. pr. & vb. n. {Populating}.] To furnish with inhabitants, either by natural increase or by immigration or colonization; to cause to be inhabited; to people. [1913 Webster]
